label: 総追捕使
本: Court and Bakufu in Japan:  Essays in Kamakura History . Stanford University Press . 1982
説明文: Originally, a provincial police officer; later became an office within individual ↓shōen. This title was granted to at least some provincial appointees of the nascent Bakufu in the 1180s.　[荘園]　[Ｃｆ.　Mass, 1976.]
